description: Contains the post resulted tracking information about specimens.

columns.name: SPECIMEN_RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the finding record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: TRACKING_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
Contains the current status for tracking a specimen after it's been resulted.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


No Treatment Required


Patient/Caregiver Needs to be Contacted


Patient/Caregiver Informed


Schedule Follow-up


Schedule Procedure


Refer Mohs/Surgeon


Follow-up Arranged


Treatment Complete


Unable to Contact Patient


Patient Refused


Refer for Excision


Refer to Resident Surgery Clinic


Refer to Other Specialties


Awaiting Additional Workup

columns.name: TRACKING_COMP_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores whether this specimen is considered complete with respect to tracking after the specimen is resulted.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Completed


Not Tracked

columns.name: POST_RESULT_DX_C_NAME
columns.description:
Contains the diagnosis used for tracking purposes after the specimen has been resulted. Not to be used as a clinical diagnosis.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


BCC


BCC, Superficial


SCC


SCC in Situ


Melanoma


Melanoma in Situ


Other Skin Cancer


Other Malignant Neoplasm


Atypical Nevus - Mild


Atypical Nevus - Moderate


Atypical Nevus - Severe


Actinic Keratosis


Other Benign Neoplasm


Other Skin Eruption


Neoplasm of Uncertain Behavior


Other

columns.name: TRACKING_DESC_ID
columns.description: Contains the a summary/comment about the specimen tracking done after the specimen has been resulted.

columns.name: TRACK_ORD_ID
columns.description: The order that the tracking data relates to. This is a virtual item linked to other rows containing the same information.
